product_name: Sea to Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash - 8.5 fl. oz.
long_description: Stock up on Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap with this 8.5 fl. oz. bottle. It's gentle on skin and fabrics but tough enough for dirty dishes and laundry stains. Contains citronella and sandalwood essential oils for a subtle fresh scent; oils help deter bugs without the use of harsh chemicals. Can be used for bathing and washing fabrics, dishes and outdoor gear. Citronella wash is biodegradable and paraben free. Use Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap sparingly; concentrated formula requires only a small amount for each use.
short_description: Stock up on Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap with this 8.5 fl. oz. bottle. It's gentle on skin and fabrics but tough enough for dirty dishes and laundry stains.
